info.author: Electronic Vision(s), KIP, Universität Heidelberg
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Lesser General Public License v2 or later (LGPLv2+)
info.description:
This module provides a Python interface to Cadence tools like spectre.
It allows to load testbench schematics, set up simulations and analyses.
It uses tools like `psf` to access the data.
info.name: chip-teststand
info.summary: Chip-Teststand, a Python interface to Cadence simulation tools
info.html_description: This module provides a Python interface to Cadence tools like spectre. It allows to load testbench schematics, set up simulations and analyses. It uses tools like psf to access the data.
